title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-contained Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, Phi, etc. runner with REST & CLI, macOS/Linux/Windows.

title: ollama-python
summary: First-party Python client and asyncio bindings for the Ollama API.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers (npm: ollama).

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package (pip: langchain-ollama) for chat, embeddings, tool-calling.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-web-ui)
summary: Full-featured ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama with multi-user, RAG, presets.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin SDK for Ollama (Maven Central: ollama4j).

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma + LangChain.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Cross-platform TUI for interactive Ollama chats with syntax highlighting.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models as GitHub Copilot replacement.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Kubernetes Helm chart for deploying Ollama with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-nvim
summary: Neovim plugin to generate, refactor and chat with Ollama inside the editor.

title: ollama-ex
summary: Elixir library (Hex: ollama_ex) for Ollama API with GenServer streaming.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate (crates.io: ollama-rs) providing async client.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK (NuGet: OllamaSharp) for chat, vision and embeddings.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module to run Ollama models in CI pipelines for code review / tests.

title: ollama-models
summary: Official registry of 100+ quantized models (Llama-3, Phi-3, Mixtral, Gemma, etc.).

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot slash-command integration for chatting with local Ollama models.

title: ollama-spring-boot-starter
summary: Spring Boot auto-configuration for Ollama (Maven: ollama-spring-boot-starter).

title: ollama-rag-qa-bot
summary: Streamlit app for PDF Q&A using Ollama embeddings + LlamaIndex.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to summarize notes and generate text via Ollama.
